titles.title: Babylon The Great Is Fallen, Is Fallen

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Babylon the great is fallen, is fallen
And become the habitation of devils
And the hold of every foul spirit
And the cage of every unclean bird.
Come ye out, people of God,
Come ye out, come ye out.
For the Lord has prepared a place for you
We shall reign with Him forever, for eternity
Come ye out, people of God, come ye out.
